ogTitle: boeing ceo testifies in front of families who lost loved ones in the 737 crash; he says he knew about test pilot concerns for the 737. - smarther news
ogDescription: i think about you and your loved ones every day.
quote: I think about you and your loved ones every day.
summary: Boeing CEO testifies in front of families who lost loved ones in the 737 crash; He says he knew about test pilot concerns for the 737.
body:
• Boeing CEO Dennis Muilenburg testified in front of the Senate.
  • Boeing makes the 737, the model of plane involved in 2 separate deadly crashes last year.
  • Muilenburg admitted today he knew about a test pilots concern regarding a system on the plane that ultimately was a factor in these two deadly accidents.

Boeing C.E.O. Knew About Pilotas Warnings Before Second Crash
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/10/29/business/boeing-ceo-hearing.html
